title: First Night
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://archiveofourown.org/works/18923620

by Spring_Haze

The couple moves to a new flat, and all they want to do is to take a shower … together. Phil appreciates Dan’s forethought at the end of a long day. Both men find the energy to enjoy each other in their new walk-in.

Words: 3377, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Phandom/The Fantastic Foursome (YouTube RPF)
  • Rating: Explicit
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M

  • Relationships: Dan Howell/Phil Lester
  • Additional Tags: Erotic Foreplay, Hair Washing, Shower Sex, Sex on Furniture, Grinding, Frotting, Edging, Nipple Play, Anal Fingering, Anal Sex, Daddy Kink, Wall Sex

blog.title: Phanfiction!
blog.description:
!!! READ THE FAQ BEFORE SENDING ME AN ASK !!!

Mobile Links

This blog is autoposts anything that gets put in the Dan Howell/Phil Lester tag on Archive of Our Own (AO3).

Sometimes the applet on IFTT I use straight up breaks. I don't recommend turning on notifications for this blog. Links don't work on mobile.

Admin: Ozzy (foolishdeadbeat)

title: Next To Me

by farquaad

It’s 2012 and things between Dan and Phil might not be perfect, but they will always be next to each other (in their lives.)

based on the song “Next To Me” by Imagine Dragons and also the quote “you’re next to me in my life.”

blog.title: The greatest thing you'll ever learn
blog.description: is just to love and be loved in return

body: CHOOSE YOUR FIGHTER!

reblog.comment: CHOOSE YOUR FIGHTER!

trail.content_raw: CHOOSE YOUR FIGHTER!
trail.content: CHOOSE YOUR FIGHTER!

tags: emotional support sweetheart where are u?
summary: *whispers his name softly into the void* phil?~ *clears throat* he will hear me *wipes single tear from halfway down my cheek*...
body:
*whispers his name softly into the void*

phil?~

*clears throat*

he will hear me

*wipes single tear from halfway down my cheek*

he always does-

reblog.comment:
*whispers his name softly into the void*

phil?~

*clears throat*

he will hear me

*wipes single tear from halfway down my cheek*

he always does-

*whispers his name softly into the void*

phil?~

*clears throat*

he will hear me

*wipes single tear from halfway down my cheek*

he always does-

blog.name: phanfictioncatalogue
blog.title: phanfiction catalogue
blog.description:
mobile users, click here!

please refer to our FAQ first.

Our goal is to create an alphabetized library of every phanfiction in the phandom. Besides that, we compile masterlists of different genres that are scheduled for posting every few days, and help find fics that have been mislocated.

title: Platonic (5) Masterlist
body:
part one, part two, part three, part four

A Bad Case of the Jitters - ineverhadmyinternetphase

Summary: Phil has night-before jitters with the release of tatinof coming tomorrow, but Dan is there to comfort him, as ever.

Half-Priced Meal - sodalester

Summary: Based on this prompt: “hey that restaurant has a valentines day discount for couples lets just pretend we’re a couple and get a candlelit lobster dinner with free dessert lol”

I’ll Be His Friend - notphilseyelash

Summary: On the train ride to Hogwarts, Phil encounters some other first years he’s not so fond of. Well, all except for one. Title taken from a quote from the fic.

Innocent Sleeping - pasteldanhowells

Summary: Dan is having trouble sleeping because he’s too busy staying up late and pacing at four am while thinking about the universe, so Phil gets worried about him and finally suggests that Dan sleeps in his room, basically just platonic!phan cuddling and comfort.

Intertwined - crescendohowell

Summary: Platonic phan where Dan and Phil are cuddle buddies.

I Now Pronounce You Best Friends For Life - phandomlarrie

Summary: “We should get married.” “What?” / the fluffy (implied aro) best friend proposal phan we all deserve.

In the mess of it all (ao3) - tigreluna

Summary: Dan and Phil mid-way trough their second and last tour. Everything seemed to be going fine: their audience were enjoying themselves and so did Dan and Phil. But on one show, something happened, Phil dind’t know if he could keep doing it.

‘Love You - crescendohowell

Summary: dan’s sad about the US tour coming to an end so he goes to talk to phil about it. cue #bants and platonic love.

Maybe I’m All Messed Up In You - homotrons

Summary: platonic!phan both get drunk and end up horny.

Midnight Tea - crescendohowell

Summary: Dan has a cough and can’t sleep. Phil takes care of him and calms him down when Dan begins freaking out.

Presenting… The Breaking Up With My Roommate Challenge! (ao3) - howelllesters

Summary: For Dan’s next video, he’s asked fans to give him a challenge, and the response is overwhelming. When he calls Phil up to inform him he’s moving out though, the response is unexpected to say the least.

Stitched Together By Scarred Skin (ao3) - frostbitten_cheeks

Summary: No one ever said the idea of soulmates comes with guaranteed romantic love, and this is where it leaves them – swaying between two sides of the depth, unable to go back and unable to go forward.

Because the bottom line is this: Dan and Phil have each other’s names written on their skin, but that doesn’t mean they’re dating.

Sugar Free - placingglaciers

Summary: In which Phil discovers that his next door neighbor, who he never talks to, is alone for Christmas and decides to change that.

That Week in March (ao3) - NelindeA

Summary: The fleshed out version of what Dan didn’t tell us what happened during “that week in March.”

Trust - ineverhadmyinternetphase

Summary: Dan convinces his parents to let him go on holiday with the guy he met on the internet.

Under the trees and shooting starts - wavydanrises

Summary: Dan’s parents have insisted that he comes with them on a family holiday at a hiking camp in the middle of the woods, and he isn’t too happy about that for various reasons. Until he meets the son of the owners, who works there.

Waiting, Hoping With Each Breath - botanistlester

Summary: After Dan’s girlfriend breaks up with him, Phil finds his best friend suddenly a lot closer than he’s ever remembered them being before. For some reason, he doesn’t mind it much at all. In fact, Phil quite enjoys the late night cuddles and the way Dan clings to him whenever they watch television. He probably enjoys it a little bit too much.

You’re As Important to Me As I Am To You (ao3) - NelindeA

Summary: Dan has an existential crisis before an Interactive Introverts performance, but as always, Phil is there to pull him out of it.

reblog.comment:
part one, part two, part three, part four

summary:
New day!
Phil here! Dan and I are headed to the park while Michael takes care of a sick Gavin. Our friends Jordan and Tom are...
body:
New day!

Phil here! Dan and I are headed to the park while Michael takes care of a sick Gavin. Our friends Jordan and Tom are moving in today, so Craig and Tyler will be helping them do just that!

I’m excited! More roommates!

reblog.comment:

blog.name: dramaphan
blog.title: Yo I Comment On The Drama When Shit Hits The Fan
blog.description:
Phandom drama? It's more likely than you think.

.

My ask box is always open if you need a place to be dramatic, share theories, conspiracies, opinions, or general grievances. Fire away, my babies. Nothing is off limits. (Except for the things that are.)

.

Icon by phanniephobic, header by cinnamonnutlester

summary: If someone has an opinion on phan being real based on their own experience watching dnp for years and talk about things from...
question: If someone has an opinion on phan being real based on their own experience watching dnp for years and talk about things from that perspective what is the problem? If you don't have the same opinion about phan it looks stupid to you but your opinion could look stupid to them too.
answer:
You’re totally right. I have no issue with people shipping phan, thinking they’d be cute together, thinking maybe there’s a possibility they might even be an actual couple. That’s a possibility. It’s always been a possibility. The only time I take issue with it, is when people assume they know literally anything at all about Dan and Phil’s private lives. You don’t know shit. You can have your theories based on whatever, but as soon as you start assuming you must be right, or trying to prove how right you are, there’s a problem. You may notice that whenever I discuss certain theories, or speculate about things, I’ll often specify that I don’t know what goes on behind the scenes and may be wrong about whatever it is I’m thinking. Because I don’t know shit. And neither do you.

You can have whatever opinion or theory or headcannon you want. But the important part is acknowledging that you don’t actually know Dan and Phil, or their lives, not even slightly. So whatever your opinion is, it may very well be dead wrong. And we’ll never know unless they say something. Which they have a history of not doing.

So whatever your opinion is, it may very well be dead wrong. And we’ll never know unless they say something. Which they have a history of not doing.

blog.title: Yo I Comment On The Drama When Shit Hits The Fan
blog.description:

.

My ask box is always open if you need a place to be dramatic, share theories, conspiracies, opinions, or general grievances. Fire away, my babies. Nothing is off limits. (Except for the things that are.)

.

Icon by phanniephobic, header by cinnamonnutlester

summary: i like how you don't see your own hypocrisy regarding the shit you speculate on here, theorising they don't live together,...
question: i like how you don't see your own hypocrisy regarding the shit you speculate on here, theorising they don't live together, lamenting about dnp not giving information, shitposting conspiracy theories, but when others you are not at all familiar with do it, it's creepy because it's not the opinion you like. convenient that you don't see your blog as a hivemind of people who don't think/doubt phan is real but if someone happens to think they are together it's a religious sect. hypocrisy.
answer:
Jesus Christ.


I’m not against anyone shipping phan. Chill. I’m against people being weird about it. Making floor plans of their apartments and trying to piece together where they are and if they went somewhere together, digging up old tweets and shit as “proof” and making wild assumptions about their sexualities and/or love lives. If you’re one of those people that’s just “you know what I think they might be together. They’d be a super cute couple” and that’s it, no problem. I’m fine. But the second you try to “prove” how gay they are, or how they totally share a bed, or whatever other private information you think you’re entitled to, then I get a little snippy.

And as always, this is a blog on tumblr.hell. It’s not that deep. If you don’t like what you see here, block me.
